description:
The InvalidVolumeAccessMode exception (nova.exception) use a __add__ method that is not supported by oslo.i18n.

The tool the doc team uses to generate the config-reference tables imports nova.exception, which fails.
title: Incorrect use of __add__ with oslo.i18n Message

comments.content:
The InvalidVolumeAccessMode exception (nova.exception) use a __add__ method that is not supported by oslo.i18n.

The tool the doc team uses to generate the config-reference tables imports nova.exception, which fails.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gpocentek

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
